article_title: Who Can Succeed Barack Obama as Digitizer in Chief?

twitter.description: Whether you like Barack Obama or not, he’s been our most digital president. In addition to the aggressive use of data and analytics in his campaigns and his positive relationship with Silicon Val...
twitter.title: Who Can Succeed Barack Obama as Digitizer in Chief?

article_metadata.description: None of the presidential candidates has the digital chops that President Obama offered. But there’s time for them to up their game.
